description: Development of an independent research project that extends a topic relevant to the discipline of architecture. Topics include architectural and environmental design, technology, practice, history, theory, heritage, and people-environment studies. This course is available to students who have completed two of the following: ARCH7012, ARCH7022, ARCH7032 and ARCH7042.
prerequisites: A GPA of 5.5 or above and two of: ARCH7012, ARCH7022, ARCH7032 and ARCH7042
